cognitive.name: Cognitive Bias
cognitive.description: Systematic patterns of deviation from rationality in judgment and decision-making

confirmation.name: Confirmation Bias
confirmation.description: Tendency to search for, interpret, favor information that confirms pre-existing beliefs

anchoring.name: Anchoring Bias
anchoring.description: Over-reliance on first piece of information encountered

availability.name: Availability Heuristic
availability.description: Overestimating likelihood of events with greater availability in memory

demographic.name: Demographic Bias
demographic.description: Bias based on demographic characteristics like age, gender, race, ethnicity

age.name: Age Bias (Ageism)
age.description: Discrimination based on age, particularly against older or younger individuals

gender.name: Gender Bias
gender.description: Discrimination or prejudice based on gender identity or expression

racial.name: Racial Bias
racial.description: Prejudice or discrimination based on race or ethnicity

sexual_orientation.name: Sexual Orientation Bias
sexual_orientation.description: Discrimination based on sexual orientation or romantic attraction

socioeconomic.name: Socioeconomic Bias
socioeconomic.description: Bias based on social class, economic status, education, or occupation

class.name: Class Bias
class.description: Prejudice based on perceived social or economic class

education.name: Educational Bias
education.description: Discrimination based on educational background or perceived intelligence

occupation.name: Occupational Bias
occupation.description: Prejudice based on job or profession

cultural.name: Cultural Bias
cultural.description: Bias based on cultural background, nationality, or religious beliefs

nationality.name: Nationality Bias
nationality.description: Prejudice based on country of origin or nationality

religious.name: Religious Bias
religious.description: Discrimination based on religious beliefs or practices

linguistic.name: Linguistic Bias
linguistic.description: Prejudice based on language, accent, or communication style

physical.name: Physical Bias
physical.description: Bias based on physical characteristics, appearance, or abilities

appearance.name: Appearance Bias
appearance.description: Discrimination based on physical appearance or attractiveness

disability.name: Disability Bias
disability.description: Prejudice against people with physical, mental, or cognitive disabilities

health.name: Health Status Bias
health.description: Discrimination based on health conditions or medical status

institutional.name: Institutional Bias
institutional.description: Systematic bias embedded in institutions, policies, or procedures

systemic.name: Systemic Bias
systemic.description: Bias embedded in systems and structures

temporal.name: Temporal Bias
temporal.description: Bias related to time periods, historical contexts, or generational differences

historical.name: Historical Bias
historical.description: Bias in interpreting or presenting historical events

generational.name: Generational Bias
generational.description: Prejudice based on generational cohort membership

ideological.name: Ideological Bias
ideological.description: Bias based on political beliefs, worldviews, or value systems

political.name: Political Bias
political.description: Prejudice based on political affiliation or beliefs

moral.name: Moral Bias
moral.description: Bias based on moral or ethical frameworks

intersectional.name: Intersectional Bias
intersectional.description: Bias arising from overlapping and interconnecting social identities

multiple_identity.name: Multiple Identity Bias
multiple_identity.description: Bias affecting individuals with multiple marginalized identities

identity_erasure.name: Identity Erasure
identity_erasure.description: Ignoring or denying aspects of intersectional identities
